artist: Artist: Tsukioka Yoshitoshi; Artist: Kawanabe Kyōsai; Publisher: Daikokuya Kinnosuke
creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation, gifts of various donors, by exchange, and gift of Edmond Freis in memory of his parents, Rose and Leon Freis
description: portrait of a woman holding a tan bookmark-like object in front of her chest in her PR hand, with a large round hole in right side with a pair of red tassels hanging from it, and a book with a purple cover in her PL hand; woman wears dark blue kimono with light blue circular pattern, with red striped collar; woman's hair ornaments have bird and leaf designs; very large, slightly abstracted purple flowers with leaves and stems in two shades of green behind woman
markings: Artist’s seal: 魁斎 {Kaisai} | Censor seal: 子七改
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From The Okadaya (Okadaya no uchi 岡田や内)
signed: 艸筆芳年 {sōhitsu Yoshitoshi}, 応需狂斎写 {ōju Kyōsai sha}
title: Takaragi
